alert.note: Alert for Butler; Elk; Greenwood (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 8:53AM CDT until May 15 at 10:15AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Elk County in southeastern Kansas... Eastern Butler County in south central Kansas... Southern Greenwood County in southeastern Kansas... * Until 1015 AM CDT. * At 853 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles north of El Dorado, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... El Dorado, Eureka, Leon, Severy, Latham, Rosalia, Cassoday, Climax, Eureka City Lake, El Dorado State Park, Eureka Airport, El Dorado Airport, Beaumont, El Dorado Lake and Piedmont. This includes Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 70 and 93. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
